mapper.select: SELECT b.no as no, b.title as title, u.name as name, b.hit as hit, TO_CHAR(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_date, b.user_no as user_no FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.no ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES (seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, #{user_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, user_no, no FROM board WHERE no = #{no}
